sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>gold</radical> <radical>pool</radical> is where you're going to go <kanji>fishing</kanji>. Because, if the pool is gold, hopefully the fish are too.
meaningInfo: Imagine yourself fishing in a gold pool, catching golden fish. What a great <kanji>fishing</kanji> spot this is.
readingMnemonic: You caught a couple of gold fish. <reading>Two</reading> (<ja>つ</ja>) gold fish, actually!
readingInfo: Count your golden fish. They're so nice! They're also worth their weight in gold, because, well, they are gold.
